title: Updating LOL Account to Riot Account
body: When I tried to log into my LOL, it showed up a dialog which tells me to update my LOL account. I clicked on the link and went to a website that let me log in with my username and password. I logged in and it takes me again to that dialog saying "update your account to Riot account". That process just loops forever. Telling me to log in and update account, and then tells me to log in again. PLEASE HELP! I cant even play League now because that dialog in my client is there forever, I cant even close it. RITO PLZ!

replies.body: The same happend to me, but the thing that fixed it was that I just copied the URL https://update-account.riotgames.com/ and pasted it the url on a different browser like Chrome.
is it forcing the playing to change user name?
Only if the UN exists elsewhere, including your own accounts on other regions. LoL accounts are regional, Riot accounts are global.
